text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
—— Oho, I found somethin'! This the Threading of Memories, 
ain't it? And this here… ain't this a hoofplaque?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. These look to be records regarding the hoofplaque 
craftsmen…… "Artisans massed at the green of autumn, each 
one packing lumber to set upon the hoofplaques' craft…"

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
That sayin' the craftsmen all gathered 'round to make them 
hoofplaques in the past? Gotta say, I'm impressed you can 
even read them squiggly marks, Ardan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
You could say it started as a pastime. I still rely heavily 
on a dictionary, but I'm glad to be of use in this manner.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
"Let thy voice be heard"… "like the flame's dance"… "be thine 
evil-banishing bow"… "reverberating sound"… "entwine the 
wandering threads of fate"… "into one brilliant strand" ——

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…… This entry appears significant as well. 
'T would do me good to take notes ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ngaaah! Look how many pages we've left… Could be reading kanji for the rest of our lives…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ain't no time to kick back though…! What's this… 
"The origins of the Sacred Equine Relay are still 
largely unknown. One prominent theory states —"

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… Is this a drawing of horsegirls running? Since they're all 
lined up, it's probably the Dash of Remembrance? It looks like 
a lot more Sacred Equines ran back then…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …… Oh no. I'm getting sleepy. Focus, focus……

…… A few study sessions later, the end 
of the camp was approaching ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
—— Shall we go over what we have learned 
from poring through the old records then?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
As I get, the Sacred Equine Relay was originally a ritual for 
horsegirls to find blessin's by prayin' to the Three Goddesses, 
but over time it done been influenced a lot by racing culture.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Shifted from blessings to prayin' for safety 'n success in races. 
So n'fact, it wasn't about the past at first…… but the future.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
In time, starting with the prayers of horsegirls who had 
retreated from racing, a search for solace in the glory 
and setbacks of past horsegirls was born……

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
By expanding from a wish for the future into a prayer to the past, 
both future and past were connected… something like that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. It could be said that the Sacred Equine Relay is 
a ceremony that connects the past, present, and future, 
entwining the threads of all horsegirls through time.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… And each ritual has its own meaning, or more like, 
feelings and wishes involved, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…… I must concede that I had selfishly assumed what 
Sacred Equines ought be like without understanding 
a thing about the meaning of their prayers.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Is that so? You had assumptions?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I did…… I had considered Sacred Equines as the heart of this 
historic ceremony, convinced that they must maintain a pure 
and solemn mind.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Convinced that by doing so… I would be able to pride myself 
on having fulfilled the noble role of Sacred Equine……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
'Tis no different from seeking the role of Sacred Equine 
out of self-indulgence. That which was truly important 
was to embrace the prayers within the ritual…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
…… Ain't much different here. I was only 
thinking 'bout my goal of winning, remember? 
Jus' tryna make this thing happen.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Guess I didn't respect them who came before me enough either. 
Just thinkin' about the excitement… so crummy a' me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…… I can see it now. The element we were missing, 
that which we should have taken to heart……

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
…… Hey, everyone? I have something 
I'd like to ask Ms. Mukai ——

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— You wish to know how horsegirls racing in the past felt?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to understand after learning more about 
the Sacred Equine Relay. What sort of prayers, 
what sort of wishes did horsegirls of the past have?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I came to this camp with only a vague idea of wanting to fulfill 
the role of Sacred Equine to help everyone in the present.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But now…… I also want to fulfill my duties 
to the past horsegirls. Please tell me.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text:
…… Very well. Having come to this point, I believe 
you all have earned the right to see this.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: What is this……?

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text:
These are all the emotions horsegirls have offered to the flames 
of the Sacred Equine Relay. It is a collection of transcripts from 
every hoofplaque written to this day.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: I am lending this to you so that you may read them.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: H-Hol' on! This really something we can look at……?!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text:
You may, yes. Now that you all are fully embracing your 
roles as Sacred Equines, you will surely find use in it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …… Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
"I've always regretted that even after racing for a long time 
I could never win one of the all-important graded races"…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
"So I pray"… "with the hope that somebody out there in 
the future"… "can win the races they really want to" ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
…… Mmm. There were horsegirls prayin' for us too, huh. 
Wishing for folks in the future — for us — to snag some victories.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
"I was forced to give up running early……" 
"In the end I was able to make a name for 
myself outside of racing, but —"……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
"If I had the chance, I would have 
wanted to do so on the track" ……mm.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
…… Ain't that right. Once ya choose to race, runnin' is what 
defines ya, an' ya wanna build yerself on it, don'tcha……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
"I'd found a companion, an incredibly gifted friend with whom I 
wished to compete on the greatest of stages. Yet, circumstances 
outside her control abruptly forced her to retire from racing"…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
"I still remember how empty I felt in that moment. 
It is my most sincere wish that the future may be 
free of such sorrow"……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…… If I were to lose a beloved rival in this way… 
I don't know what I would……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
"The culmination of my dreams was right in front of me,"… 
"becoming Japan's number one horsegirl only a step away"… 
"when my legs refused to carry me further"…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
"I hope no one else will ever have to go through this" 
"Never to have to know this feeling"… "Never be left with"… 
"this eternal yearning"……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Aah… her bitter despair must run far deeper than words… 
an emotion so poignant. Please, allow me to bear your grief…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"Running and winning for the people who supported me 
was very fulfilling". "They were all so happy to see me on 
the cover of a magazine, and that made me happy in turn".

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"I pray future horsegirls may find the same happiness"… I see, 
there have been many horsegirls running for the sake of others.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So many of them ran… and their feeling remained here…… 
Today… it's me standing in their place……

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Looks like we're all done reading. …Haha, every one a' ya 
standing there with the same face's a proper laugh.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Have ya seen yer own?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
…… Hey, listen. Before we hit the last presentation, 
I wanna discuss summ'n together ——
